rules_text:
Advance {3}{W}{W} [i](Cast this for {3}{W}{W} to advance it as it enters. {3}{W}{W}: Advance this as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever Inconspicuous Loxodon advances, search your library for an Equipment card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
As long as Inconspicuous Loxodon is enchanted or equipped, he's a 5/5 legendary Elephant Rogue named Agent E.
